attributes.action: Review & regulate English football System. Limit owner power. Empower fans.
attributes.additional_details:
Football has reached it's watershed moment. Clubs accross the country are facing collapse, while those at the top of the pyramid continue to look to increase profit expenensially and create a closed shop. 

Sport can be profitable, but the ethos of fair play cannot be lost in the search for financial gain. 

Fans must have a say in how their clubs are run. Impact on local communities and stakeholders must be considered in the running of clubs. They are not only businesses, they are our heritage.
attributes.background: Urgent review into English football system to prevent profetiering with disregard to the health of the sport. Protect the level playing field to all clubs with promotion/relegation/qualificaition at all levels. Min % of profits reinvested into lower tiers. Individual, team and board member pay caps

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has announced a fan-led review of football governance. You can read the terms of reference for this review here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/fan-led-review-of-football-governance.

You may like to sign these petitions which call for related actions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584632
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310
